system.description:
Trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Power-Crystal
Effect: This attack uses the higher of the user's ATK or SPATK for calculating damage.
Requirement: [Necrozma] Z-Power-Crystal as an Accessory Item and Photon Geyser on the user's Active List.

actions.name: Light the Burn the Sky
